actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A joint resolution to establish a national policy for taking of predatory or scavenging mammals and birds on public lands, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Prohibits all taking of wolves and other predators or scavengers on public lands, except under procedures prescribed in this Act. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A joint resolution to establish a national policy for taking of predatory or scavenging mammals and birds on public lands, and for other purposes.
